item.title: Leaving Coursera
item.description: Leaving Coursera I’ve departed Coursera after working there for the past 7+ years. I am extremely thankful for all the personal and professional relationships I built with the people there. I will always cherish the memories, including the offsites, make-a-thons, ping pong, badminton, tennis, cricket and soccer we played during my time there. The informal and grad-school-like culture in my initial years at the company was the highlight of my time spent there.
